example.gpt4_src: Hau aprende linguajen foun iha eskola.
example.gpt4_tgt: I am learning a new language at school.

example.gpt4_src: Ami nia avó mak veteranu iha guerra.
example.gpt4_tgt: Our grandfather is a veteran of the war.

example.gpt4_src: Bomba ne'e nakfilak iha uma laran.
example.gpt4_tgt: The bomb exploded inside the house.

example.gpt4_src: Nia hanorin-an hanesan tradutór iha universidade.
example.gpt4_tgt: She works as a translator at the university.

example.gpt4_src: Ema ne'e hatudu profesionalismu iha servisu nia laran.
example.gpt4_tgt: This person demonstrates professionalism in their work.

example.gpt4_src: Assosiasaun ne'e ajuda komunidade hodi dezenvolve projetu sira.
example.gpt4_tgt: The association helps the community to develop projects.

example.gpt4_src: Ita bele uza examplu ida ne'e hodi hatene liu tan.
example.gpt4_tgt: You can use this example to understand better.

example.gpt4_src: Ema tenke hatene kona-ba prevensaun husi HIV-SIDA.
example.gpt4_tgt: People need to know about the prevention of HIV-AIDS.

example.gpt4_src: Labarik sira halimar iha duut ne'ebé toos.
example.gpt4_tgt: The children are playing on the grass in the field.

example.gpt4_src: Ami bele lori másimu 20 ema ba pasiar iha loron Sabadu.
example.gpt4_tgt: We can take a maximum of 20 people for the trip on Saturday.

example.gpt4_src: Ami celebra aniversáriu kaben ami nia tinan lima iha loron Sabadu.
example.gpt4_tgt: We celebrated our fifth wedding anniversary on Saturday.

example.gpt4_src: Inísiu loron-nain ida ne'e, ami hanoin atu halo festa.
example.gpt4_tgt: At the beginning of this week, we thought about having a party.

example.gpt4_src: Ema ne'ebé servisu iha governu tenke hetan formasaun kona-ba lei foun.
example.gpt4_tgt: People who work in the government need to receive training on the new law.

example.gpt4_src: Matadalan ne'e sei ajuda ita hatene dalan ba uma.
example.gpt4_tgt: This guide will help you find the way home.

example.gpt4_src: Kompetisaun iha eskola ne'e halo estudante sira hakarak aprende liu.
example.gpt4_tgt: The competition at this school makes students want to learn more.

example.gpt4_src: Ami nia vizinyu hosi Fiji, nia hanoin barak kona ba kultura Fijianu.
example.gpt4_tgt: Our neighbor from Fiji often talks about Fijian culture.

example.gpt4_src: Timor-Leste nian ekonomia depende barak ba atividade marítima.
example.gpt4_tgt: Timor-Leste's economy heavily depends on maritime activities.

example.gpt4_src: Labarik sira halimar ho bola iha kampu.
example.gpt4_tgt: The children are playing with a ball in the field.

example.gpt4_src: Iha sékulu ne'e, Timor-Leste hetan independénsia hosi Indonézia.
example.gpt4_tgt: In this century, Timor-Leste gained independence from Indonesia.

example.gpt4_src: Nia sai hosi uma tuku hitu dader.
example.gpt4_tgt: He leaves the house at seven in the morning.

example.gpt4_src: Estudante sira iha universidade ne'e aprende kona-ba sains no teknologia.
example.gpt4_tgt: The students at this university are learning about science and technology.

example.gpt4_src: Hau gosta hemu kafe iha dadeer.
example.gpt4_tgt: I like to drink coffee in the morning.

example.gpt4_src: Ita nia kolektivu halo servisu hamutuk hodi ajuda komunidade.
example.gpt4_tgt: Our collective works together to help the community.

example.gpt4_src: Sira hotu-hotu konkorda ho plano ida-ne'e.
example.gpt4_tgt: They all agree with this plan.

example.gpt4_src: Notísia ne'e importante atu hatene kona-ba situasaun polítika iha Timor-Leste.
example.gpt4_tgt: This news is important to understand the political situation in Timor-Leste.

example.gpt4_src: Ita bele baa merkadu aban dadeer.
example.gpt4_tgt: We can go to the market tomorrow morning.

example.gpt4_src: Orgaun governu nian halo desizaun importante ba nasaun.
example.gpt4_tgt: The government organ makes important decisions for the nation.

example.gpt4_src: Ita bele halimar iha parke nee.
example.gpt4_tgt: You can relax in this park.

example.gpt4_src: Sira nia domisíliu iha Dili, maibé sira la bele fila ba iha loron-loron.
example.gpt4_tgt: Their residence is in Dili, but they cannot return every day.

example.gpt4_src: Polísia halo interrogatóriu ba ema ne'ebé suspeitu iha krime ne'e.
example.gpt4_tgt: The police conducted a questioning of the person suspected in the crime.

example.gpt4_src: Maria mak kandidata ba prezidente iha eleisaun tinan ida oin.
example.gpt4_tgt: Maria is a candidate for president in the upcoming election.

example.gpt4_src: Insidensia ne'e maka la'o ba polísia atu buka solusaun.
example.gpt4_tgt: This incident was reported to the police to find a solution.

example.gpt4_src: Ami nia kompaniia nian iha Dili.
example.gpt4_tgt: Our company is located in Dili.

example.gpt4_src: Hau gosta lao iha madrugada tanba iha tempu ne'ebá ema seidauk barak.
example.gpt4_tgt: I like to walk during the pre-dawn hours because there aren't many people around.

example.gpt4_src: Ema dezlokadu sira ne'e presiza ajuda hodi hetan uma foun.
example.gpt4_tgt: The displaced persons need help to find new homes.

example.gpt4_src: Rai ne'e fukun hosi bee.
example.gpt4_tgt: This land is the source of water.

example.gpt4_src: Povu Timor-Leste hatudu rezisténsia ba okupasaun estranjeiru.
example.gpt4_tgt: The people of Timor-Leste showed resistance to foreign occupation.

example.gpt4_src: Iha ambitu edukasaun, estudante sira tenki aprende lian Tetun no lian Inglez.
example.gpt4_tgt: In the context of education, students need to learn both Tetun and English.

example.gpt4_src: Ami tenki pasa hosi alfándega antes de tama iha Timor-Leste.
example.gpt4_tgt: We need to go through customs before entering Timor-Leste.

example.gpt4_src: Hau gosta ko'alia ho baju mutin.
example.gpt4_tgt: I like to wear white clothes.

example.gpt4_src: Hau sei fila ba Timor-Leste iha tinan oin.
example.gpt4_tgt: I will return to Timor-Leste next year.

example.gpt4_src: Ha’u-nia kareta ne’e foun.
example.gpt4_tgt: My car is new.

example.gpt4_src: Timor-Leste mak rai ida ne'ebe iha laran kultura barak.
example.gpt4_tgt: Timor-Leste is a country rich in culture.

example.gpt4_src: Nia hela iha komarka tanba nia halo krime.
example.gpt4_tgt: He is in jail because he committed a crime.

example.gpt4_src: Aprovizionamentu ba projetu ne'e tenki halo ho atensaun atu la bele iha falta.
example.gpt4_tgt: The procurement for this project must be done carefully to avoid shortages.

example.gpt4_src: Nia bele traduz livru ne'e ba lian Tetun.
example.gpt4_tgt: He can translate this book into Tetun.

example.gpt4_src: Sira iha programa ida atu ajuda estudante sira iha eskola.
example.gpt4_tgt: They have a plan to help students in school.

example.gpt4_src: Fiskalizasaun iha merkadu ne'e halo hodi garante katak ema sira la halo violasaun ba lei.
example.gpt4_tgt: The inspection in this market is conducted to ensure that people do not violate the law.

example.gpt4_src: Finalizasaun ba projetu ne'e sei akontese iha fulan oin.
example.gpt4_tgt: The finalisation of this project will happen next month.

example.gpt4_src: Nia iha espíritu forte atu ajuda komunidade.
example.gpt4_tgt: He has a strong spirit to help the community.
